title: "Logging on..."
body: Hey I have played multiple games today and all of a sudden I DC from chat so I go ahead and relog. However I can no longer get past the logging in page. I have done all the steps riot mentions in their support page but I have yet to come up with a solution. Thanks for any help.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is starting to act wonky, and failing to establish a connection to the login servers.  I'm not sure which support page you looked over, but I highly recommend going through each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide carefully.  This should get you fixed up!
